ApplicationSchema<SimpleApplication,SimpleApplicationSchema>
public class SimpleApplicationSchema
extends AbstractApplicationSchema<SimpleApplication,SimpleApplicationSchema>

A SimpleApplicationSchema is a simple implementation of an ApplicationSchema.
